set(ITK3P_INSTALL_EXPORT_NAME "${ITK-Expat-targets}")
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_INCLUDE_DIR "${ITK-Expat_INSTALL_INCLUDE_DIR}")
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_RUNTIME_DIR "${ITK-Expat_INSTALL_RUNTIME_DIR}")
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_LIBRARY_DIR "${ITK-Expat_INSTALL_LIBRARY_DIR}")
set(ITK3P_INSTALL_ARCHIVE_DIR "${ITK-Expat_INSTALL_ARCHIVE_DIR}")
add_subdirectory(expat)
itk_module_target(ITKEXPAT NO_INSTALL)
